    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void getCustomerAppts​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Retrieves all the appointments for the specified customer, and populates the combo boxes with the months of the appointments and the types.
      void getCustomerReportsByMonth​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Counts the number of appointments the selected customer has in the selected month.
      void getCustomerReportsByType​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Counts the number of appointments the selected customer has of the selected type.
      void getUserApptCount​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Retrieves the count of appointments for the specified user and sets the text field with the value.
      void goToMainMenuWindow​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)  
      void initialize()  
      void populateComboBoxCustomerApptMonths()
      Checks all of the customer's appointments for a start date month and adds it to a hash set if it is not already contained there.
      void populateComboBoxCustomerApptTypes()
      Checks all of the customer's appointments for the type and adds it to a hash set if it is not already contained there.
      void populateCustomerCombo()
      Populates the customer combo box with all the customers in the database, for selection.
      void populateUserCombo()
      Populates the user combo box with all the users in the database, for selection.

      • populateComboBoxCustomerApptMonths

        public void populateComboBoxCustomerApptMonths()
        Checks all of the customer's appointments for a start date month and adds it to a hash set if it is not already contained there. Then adds all of the discreet month numbers to the observable list, which then is used to set the combo box items.

      • populateComboBoxCustomerApptTypes

        public void populateComboBoxCustomerApptTypes()
        Checks all of the customer's appointments for the type and adds it to a hash set if it is not already contained there. Then adds all of the discreet types to the observable list, which then is used to set the combo box items.
